message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15000. Considering my commitment to providing exceptional value and service, I propose to offer this product to you for $14000. This price not only represents a significant saving for you but also ensures a fair return for us while maintaining our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.
